sen.j: 伊根の舟屋（いねのふなや） は、京都府与謝郡伊根町の伊根地区にある民家の種類のひとつである。
sen.e: Located in the Ine area of Ine Town, Yosa County, Kyoto Prefecture, the Ine no funaya houses are private houses of a type.
Located in the Ine area of Ine Town, Yosa County, Kyoto Prefecture, the Ine no funaya houses are private houses..
The Ine no Funaya (a large cluster of traditional fishermen houses) houses are private houses, located in the Ine area of Ine-cho Town, Yosa-gun County, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 舟屋から見る海の景観、海から見る舟屋の景観が美しい。
sen.e: The view of sea from funaya houses and that of funaya houses from sea are beautiful.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The views of sea from the funaya houses and that of funaya houses from sea are beautiful.
The views of sea from the funaya houses and that of funaya houses from sea are beautiful.

sen.j: そのため、伊根町の代表的な観光スポットとして観光客が多く訪れる。
sen.e: Therefore, the area is a well-known sightseeing spot in Ine Town and is visited by many tourists.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Therefore, the area is a well-known sightseeing spot in Ine Town and is visited by many tourists.
Therefore, the area is a well-known sightseeing spot in Ine Town and is visited by many tourists.

sen.j: また、近年では伊根町内での映画やドラマのロケがあり、全国に名が知られている。
sen.e: In addition, areas in Ine Town have recently been used for locations for movies or dramas, making the name of Ine known nationally.
In addition, areas in Ine Town have recently been used for locations for movies or dramas, making the name of Ine known nationally.
In addition, areas in Ine Town have recently been used for locations for movies or dramas, making the name of Ine known nationally.

sen.j: 舟屋は江戸時代中期頃から存在しているものと見られる。
sen.e: It is considered that the funaya houses have existed since around the middle of the Edo period.
It is considered that the funaya houses have existed since around the middle of the Edo period.
It is considered that the funaya houses have existed since around the middle of the Edo period.

sen.j: 舟屋は2000年現在、238棟が確認されている。
sen.e: It is ascertained that 234 funaya houses existed as of 2000.
It is confirmed that 234 funaya houses existed as of 2000.
It is confirmed that 238 funaya houses existed as of 2000.

sen.j: 特徴としては基本的に「海への開口」、「妻入り」の2点である。
sen.e: Features of these houses are basically as follows: They are provided with a space open to the sea and are built using the tsuma-iri (the entrance is provded on a gable side) style.
Features of these houses are basically as follows: They are provided with a space open to the sea and are built using the tsuma-iri (entrance is provded on the gable side) style.
Features of these houses are basically as follows: They are provided with a space open to the sea and are built using the tsuma-iri (entrance is provided on the gable side) style.

sen.j: こうした特徴が評価され、国の重要伝統的建造物群保存地区の選定を受けている。
sen.e: These features have been evaluated highly, and the area was designated as one of the national preservation dstricts for groups of historic buildings.
These features have been highly evaluated, and the area was designated as one of the national preservation dstricts for groups of historic buildings.
These features have been highly evaluated, and the area was designated as one of the national preservation districts for groups of historic buildings.

sen.j: 漁村では全国で初めて
sen.e: Such a designation is the first for the fishing villages in Japan.
Such a designation is the first for a fishing village in Japan.
Such a designation is the first for a fishing village in Japan.

sen.j: 舟屋は伊根湾の海面すれすれに建築されている。
sen.e: A funaya house is built close to the sea surface of the Ine bay.
A funaya house is built close to the sea surface of the Ine bay.
A funaya house is built close to the sea surface of the Ine-wan bay.

sen.j: 1階には船揚場、物置、作業場があり、出漁の準備、漁具の手入れ、魚干物の乾場や農産物の置き場などと幅広く活用されている。
sen.e: Provided with a non-sea area where a boat is to be placed, a storage room and a working space, the first floor is used for various purposes, such as maintaining fishing gears, drying fishes to make dried fishes and placing agricaltural products.

Provided with a non-sea area where a boat is to be placed, a storage room and a working space, the first floor is used for various purposes, such as for maintaining fishing gear, for drying fish and for storing agricultural products.

Provided with a non-sea area where a boat is to be placed, a storage room and a working space, the first floor is used for various purposes, such as for maintaining fishing gear, for drying fish and for storing agricultural products.

sen.j: また、2階は居室、民宿といった生活の場となっている。
sen.e: The second floor is used for living, such as a living room and/or rooms for minshuku operation (providng lodging and measls to tourists in a private house).
The second floor is used for living, includes a living room and/or rooms for minshuku operation (providng lodging and meals for tourists in a private house).
The second floor is used for living, includes a living room and rooms for minshuku operation (providing lodging and meals for tourists in a private house).
